DOC.brief_summary: This study will use retrospective data to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and re-injection interval of OZURDEX速 in the treatment of macular oedema due to Retinal Vein Occlusion (RVO).
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Data Collection Study in Patients Receiving Dexamethasone Intravitreal Implant (Ozurdex速) for Macular Oedema Due to Retinal Vein Occlusion (RVO)
DOC.criteria: Macular oedema in the study eye due to BRVO or CRVO Received at least 2 OZURDEX速 injections in the study eye Received OZURDEX速 injections as part of or during any clinical study
